name: Outro
_source: speak;Sal;Whew, that should be all. They didn't even stand a chance!|Just a little further, right Pikno?
speak;Pikno;Ah, well...|That seems to be the case...
speak;Sal;Let's go on! We can make it!
speak;Sal;Well, thankfully that's over.|Full speed ahead!
speak;Argento;Right... Things are changing...|Now that your father is with the goddess...

speak;Elias;But Sir Argento, change can be for the better, of course.|I swear that I will ensure the prosperity of all nations.|Aurelia is my home, a land of golden rays.|I wish for every man, woman and child to bask in the wonders of the world.
speak;EmelinePrincess;In the light...|I just feel as though I am lost in a cloud...
speak;Argento;The Goddess works in strange ways.|This too, will pass.
speak;Elias;I wish for you to help me, every step of the way, Emmie.|I know I cannot do this alone.
speak;EmelinePrincess;I will do whatever I can.
speak;Argento;Now, we must prepare your speech, Elias.|Time is of the essence, we only have a few hours left!
speak;Elias;We'll speak soon, Emmie, with me as king!|I can hardly believe the time has come...
